name: Action Tanks
description:
Battle like it was 1997

Actions tanks is an arcade game inspired by the good old games from when Atari ruled the planet,  also know as the golden age of arcade video games.

Fire at enemy tanks while dodging their shells. 

Hot seat is the name of the game, no fancy multiplayer will be added. Bring your friends an take a seat next to the screen and just have a blast! 

Early Access - Alpha

This game is in a very early stage and only offers a very limited set of the features intended.  This means that you can influence the direction the game is taking. Join the discussion on our Discord Server. 

The goal is to offer:

  • In game editor so you can build your own levels
  • Ability to upload and download levels
  • Co-op support with up to 4 players (maybe)
  • PVP mode with up to 4 players
  • Boss fights

Platforms:

  • PC
  • Xbox One
  • ** Possibly mac**
